subject: Add fun style guide adapted from Koinz design system
body:
Creates comprehensive STYLE_GUIDE.md with vibrant, creative design tokens:
- Electric Violet/Hot Pink/Cyber Cyan primary palette
- Deep indigo dark mode (not pure black)
- Gradient accent system
- Typography using Space Grotesk + Inter
- Motion and micro-animation guidelines
- Component patterns for buttons, inputs, cards
- Accessibility requirements maintained
